en.title: FE Donates VND 50 Million (RM 10,000) to Vietnam Special Needs Children!
en.content:
FE is proud to donate VND 50 million (RM 10,000) to Vietnam Special Needs Children for their Football Championship. The Mock Cheque was presented to Miss Hoa, representing the Vietnam Special Needs Children, by FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee and witnessed by FE's Vietnam Country Licensee Doan Nguyen during FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner in Ho Chi Minh City on the 
18th April 2009.

The Vietnam Special Needs Children are children living in charity homes, many of whom are orphans. The Football Championships will be held from 27th - 31st May 2009 and will be opened by the President of Vietnam. The main organizers are Vietnam Sports Newspaper, Ho Chi Minh City Police Newspaper and the Football Championship will be telecast on Vietnam TV and HCM TV.

meta.description: FusionExcel donates VND 50 Million (RM 10,000) to Vietnam Special Needs Children in Ho Chi Minh City on the 18th April 2009.
meta.keyword: Vietnam Special Needs Children, Miss Hoa, Paul Ting, Kenny Yick, KS Lee, Doan Nguyen, Ho Chi Minh City, 18th April 2009
